meanings.definition: A delayed effect following an event or action.
meanings.sent1: The aftereffect of the loud fireworks was the scared dog hiding under the bed.
meanings.sent2: The doctor warned the patient about the aftereffect of the medication, which might cause drowsiness.
meanings.sent3: The aftereffect of eating too much cake was a stomach ache that lasted all night.
meanings.sent4: The aftereffect of the storm was a rainbow that stretched across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The aftereffect of the paint fumes was a headache that lingered for hours.

meanings.definition: A result or consequence that occurs after something else.
meanings.sent1: The aftereffect of skipping breakfast was feeling hungry during the morning meeting.
meanings.sent2: The aftereffect of the heavy rain was flooding in the streets.
meanings.sent3: The aftereffect of the joke was laughter that echoed through the room.
meanings.sent4: The aftereffect of the decision was a chain of events that led to unexpected outcomes.
meanings.sent5: The aftereffect of the surprise party was a smile that stayed on her face all day.
